trans-unit.source: Represents the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) <xref uid="langword_csharp_selector" name="selector" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 代表 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) <xref uid="langword_csharp_selector" name="selector" href=""> </xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The W3C `field` element is a collection of `XmlSchemaXPath` classes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaXPath"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaXPath"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the attribute for the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XPath 運算式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An XPath expression that is relative to each element that is selected by the selector of the identity constraint.
trans-unit.target: XPath 運算式會在相對於所選取的識別條件約束的選取器的每個項目。

trans-unit.source: This expression must identify a single element or attribute whose content or value is used for the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 此運算式必須識別的單一項目或屬性的內容或值用於條件約束。

trans-unit.source: If the expression identifies an element, that element must be a simple type.
trans-unit.target: 如果運算式會識別項目，該項目必須是簡單類型。

trans-unit.source: The string attribute value for the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 運算式的字串屬性值。
